name: Clare Duff
content: I think this book is really funny and a comedy book.This book is all about Greg going to Isla de Corales.

name: Connor
content: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Getaway is a good book, the humor is good, the story is fine, feels like a mix of dog days and the long haul, i wish it was longer (but all wimpy kid books are short), so overall good book!

name: Marie
content: I've never read a Diary of a Wimpy Kid book, although my son has every single one. As a teacher, I thought I would read it to see why my students are into this series so much. Now, I see Greg and his family is a typical family and although they come across trouble they make the best of it. The book was hilarious.

name: Renata
content: Works of art by Fernando Botero and Frida Kahlo are invoked throughout, as are the fairy tales in which the author searches for analogues to explain her condition.
